overview: In the thirteenth year of Tianhe, the An family of Luoyang has been growing in power, and has collaborated with the demon master Ling Xuan to rebel. A scholar with a heart for the world, Du Ziteng, introduces Ling Xuan's disciple, Yue Hanjiao, to the righteous path, and together with Li Bai, a swordsman with a vengeance for the murder of his wife, they set out to save the people of Luoyang. ...... The battle of Luoyang is about to begin!
title: Monsters In Luoyang
